<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Stingy Scholar: How to Learn for Free on the Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Geizige Gelehrte: Wie man für freies auf
dem Web erlernt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Disciple Avare : Comment apprendre pour 
libre sur le Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Scholar Stingy: Como aprender para livre no
Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Erudito Stingy: Come imparare per libero 
sul Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο φιλάργυρος μελετητής: Πώς να μάθει δωρεάν 
στον Ιστό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Erudito Tacaño: Cómo aprender para libre
en el Web</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A blog regarding free learning resources on the web.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein blog betreffend ist freie 
erlernenbetriebsmittel auf dem Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un blog concernant les ressources d'étude libres 
sur le Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um blog a respeito dos recursos de aprendizagem 
livres no Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un blog per quanto riguarda le risorse imparanti 
libere sul Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα blog σχετικά με τα ελεύθερα στοιχεία 
συμπεριφοράς εκμάθησης στον Ιστό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un blog con respecto a recursos que aprenden libres
en el Web.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

        <rights>
